Verses: 1 maga Ganamporundhiya Theyoppiluve, Naangal Muzhunichchayamaai Nambugira Sangadhigalai,
2 aarambamudhal Kannaarakkandu Vasanaththaip Podhiththavargal Engalukku Oppuviththapadiye Avaikalaikkuriththuch Sariththiram Ezhudha Anegamper Erpattapadiyinaal,
3 aadhimudhal Ellaavatraiyum Thittamaai Visaariththarindha Naanum Umakku Ubadhesikkappatta Viseshangalin Nichchayaththai Neer Ariyavendumendru,
4 avaigalai Ozhungaai Umakku Ezhudhuvadhu Enakku Nalamaaith Thondritru.

5 yoodheyaa Dhesaththin Raajaavaagiya Erodhin Naatkalil, Abiyaa Ennum Aasaariya Vakuppil Sagariyaa Ennum Perkonda Aasaariyan Oruvan Irundhaan. Avan Manaivi Aaronudaiya Kumaaraththigalil Oruththi, Aval Per Elisabeththu.
6 avargal Iruvarum Karththaritta Sagala Karpanaigalinpadiyeyum Niyamangalinpadiyeyum Kutramatravargalaai Nadandhu, Dhevanukku Munbaaga Needhiyullavargalaayirundhaargal.
7 elisabeththu Maladiyaayirundhapadiyinaal, Avargalukkup Pillaiyillaadhirundhadhu; Iruvarum Vayadhusendravargalaayum Irundhaargal.
8 appadiyirukka, Avan Than Aasaariya Vaguppin Muraippadi Dhevasannidhiyile Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seydhuvarugira Kaalaththil,
9 aasaariya Oozhiya Muraimaiyinpadi, Avan Dhevaalayaththukkul Piravesiththuth Thoobankaattugiradharkuch Seettaip Petraan.
10 thoopankaattugira Velaiyile Janangalellaarum Koottamaai Veliye Jebampannikkondirundhaargal.
11 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Oruvan Thoobapeedaththin Valadhu Pakkaththile Nindru Avarukkuth Dharisanamaanaan.
12 sagariyaa Avanaikkandu Kalangi, Bayamadaindhaan.
13 thoodhan Avanai Nokki: Sagariyaave, Bayappadaadhe, Un Vendudhal Ketkappattadhu, Un Manaiviyaagiya Elisabeththu Unakku Oru Kumaaranaip Peruvaal, Avanukku Yovaan Endru Periduvaayaaga.
14 unakkuch Sandhoshamum Magizhchchiyum Undaagum, Avan Pirappinimiththam Anegar Sandhoshappaduvaargal.
15 avan Karththarukku Munbaagap Periyavanaayiruppaan, Thiraatcharasamum Madhuvum Kudiyaan, Than Thaayin Vayitrilirukkumpodhe Parisuththa Aaviyinaal Nirappappattiruppaan.
16 avan Isravel Sandhadhiyaaril Anegarai Avargal Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththirkuth Thiruppuvaan.

17 pidhaakkaludaiya Irudhayangalaip Pillaikalidaththirkum, Keezhppadiyaadhavargalai Needhimaangaludaiya Gnaanaththirkum Thiruppi, Uththamamaana Janaththaik Karththarukku Aayaththappaduththumpadiyaaga, Avan Eliyaavin Aaviyum Balamum Udaiyavanaai Avarukku Munne Nadappaan Endraan.
18 appozhudhu Sagariyaa Dhevadhoodhanai Nokki: Idhai Naan Edhinaal Ariven; Naan Kizhavanaayirukkiren; En Manaiviyum Vayadhusendravalaayirukkiraale Endraan.
19 dhevadhoodhan Avanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Naan Dhevasannidhaanaththil Nirkira Gaabiriyel Enbavan; Unnudane Pesavum, Unakku Indha Narseydhiyai Arivikkavum Anuppappattu Vandhen;
20 idho, Thagundha Kaalaththile Niraiverappogira En Vaarththaigalai Nee Visuvaasiyaadhapadiyinaal, Ivaigal Sampavikkum Naalmattum Nee Pesakkoodaamal Oomaiyaayiruppaai Endraan.
21 janangal Sagariyaavukkuk Kaaththirundhu, Avan Dhevaalayaththil Thaamadhiththadhinaal Aachchariyappattaargal.
22 avan Veliye Vandhapodhu Avargalidaththil Pesakkoodaamalirundhaan; Adhinaale Dhevaalayaththil Oru Dharisanaththaik Kandaanendru Arindhaargal. Avanum Avargalukkuch Saigai Kaatti Oomaiyaayirundhaan.
23 avanudaiya Oozhiyaththin Naatkal Niraiverinavudane Than Veettukkupponaan.
24 annaatkalukkuppinbu, Avan Manaiviyaagiya Elisabeththu Karppavadhiyaagi: Janangalukkulle Enakku Undaayirundha Nindhaiyai Neekkumpadiyaakak Karththar Indha Naatkalil Enmel Kadaatcham Vaiththu,
25 enakku Ippadich Seydharulinaar Endru Solli, Aindhu Maadham Velippadaadhirundhaal.
26 aaraam Maadhaththile Gaabiriyel Ennum Thoodhan, Galileyaavilulla Naasareththennum Ooril,
27 thaaveedhin Vamsaththaanaagiya Yoseppu Engira Naamamulla Purushanukku Niyamikkappattirundha Oru Kannigaiyinidaththirku Dhevanaale Anuppappattaan; Andhak Kannigaiyin Per Mariyaal.
28 aval Irundha Veettil Dhevadhoodhan Piravesiththu: Kirubai Petravale Vaazhga, Karththar Unnudane Irukkiraar, Sthireekalukkulle Nee Aaseervathikkappattaval Endraan.
29 avalo Avanaikkandu Avan Vaarththaiyinaal Kalangi, Indha Vaazhththudhal Eppadippattadho Endru Sindhiththukkondirundhaal.
30 dhevadhoodhan Avalai Nokki: Mariyaale, Payappadaadhe, Nee Dhevanidaththil Kirubaipetraai.
31 idho, Nee Karppavadhiyaagi Oru Kumaaranaip Peruvaai; Avarukku Yesu Endru Periduvaayaaga.
32 avar Periyavaraayiruppaar, Unnadhamaanavarudaiya Kumaaran Ennappaduvaar; Karththaraagiya Dhevan Avarudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Thaaveedhin Singaasanaththai Avarukkuk Koduppaar.
33 avar Yaakkobin Kudumpaththaarai Endrendraikkum Arasaaluvaar; Avarudaiya Raajyaththukku Mudiviraadhu Endraan.
34 adharku Mariyaal Dhevadhoodhanai Nokki: Idhu Eppadiyaakum? Purushanai Ariyene Endraal.

35 dhevadhoodhan Avalukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Parisuththa Aavi Unmel Varum; Unnadhamaanavarudaiya Balam Unmel Nizhalidum; Aadhalaal Unnidaththil Pirakkum Parisuththamulladhu Dhevanudaiya Kumaaran Ennappadum.
36 idho, Unakku Inaththaalaayirukkira Elisabeththum Than Mudhirvayadhile Oru Puththiranaik Karppandhariththirukkiraal; Maladiyennappatta Avalukku Idhu Aaraam Maadham.
37 dhevanaale Koodaadha Kaariyam Ondrumillai Endraan.
38 adharku Mariyaal: Idho, Naan Aandavarukku Adimai, Ummudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadi Enakku Aagakkadavadhu Endraal. Appozhudhu Dhevadhoodhan Avalidaththilirundhu Poivittaan.
39 annaatkalil Mariyaal Ezhundhu, Malainaattile Yoodhaavilulla Oru Pattanaththirkuth Theeviramaaip Poi,
40 sagariyaavin Veettukkul Piravesiththu, Elisabeththai Vaazhththinaal.
41 elisabeththu Mariyaaludaiya Vaazhththudhalaik Kettapozhudhu, Avaludaiya Vayitrilirundha Pillai Thullitru; Elisabeththu Parisuththa Aaviyinaal Nirappappattu,
42 uraththasaththamaai: Sthireekalukkulle Nee Aaseervadhikkappattaval, Un Karppaththin Kaniyum Aaseervadhikkappattadhu.
43 en Aandavarudaiya Thaayaar Ennidaththil Vandhadhu Enakku Edhinaal Kidaiththadhu,
44 idho, Nee Vaazhththina Saththam En Kaadhil Vizhundhavudane, En Vayitrilulla Pillai Kalippaaith Thullitru.
45 visuvaasiththavale Baakkiyavadhi, Karththaraale Avalukkuch Sollappattavaigal Avalukku Niraiverum Endraal.
46 appozhudhu Mariyaal: En Aaththumaa Karththarai Magimaippaduththugiradhu,
47 en Aavi En Ratchagaraagiya Dhevanil Kalikoorugiradhu.
48 avar Thammudaiya Adimaiyin Thaazhmaiyai Nokkippaarththaar; Idho, Idhumudhal Ellaach Sandhadhigalum Ennaip Baakkiyavadhi Enbaargal.
49 vallamaiyudaiyavar Magimaiyaanavaigalai Enakkuch Seydhaar; Avarudaiya Naamam Parisuththamulladhu.
50 avarudaiya Irakkam Avarukkup Bayandhirukkiravargalukkuth Thalaimurai Thalaimuraikkumulladhu.
51 thammudaiya Puyaththinaale Baraakkiramanjseydhaar; Irudhayasindhaiyil Agandhaiyullavargalaich Sidharadiththaar.
52 balavaangalai Aasanangalilirundhu Thalli, Thaazhmaiyaanavargalai Uyarththinaar.
53 pasiyullavargalai Nanmaigalinaal Nirappi, Aisuvariyamullavargalai Verumaiyaai Anuppivittaar.
54 nammudaiya Pidhaakkalukku Avar Sonnapadiye, Aabiragaamukkum Avan Sandhadhikkum Endrendraikkum Irakkanjseyya Ninaiththu,
55 thammudaiya Thaasanaagiya Isravelai Aadhariththaar Endraal.
56 mariyaal Erakkuraiya Moondrumaadham Avaludane Irundhu, Than Veettukkuth Thirumpipponaal.
57 elisabeththukkup Pirasavakaalam Niraiverinapodhu Aval Oru Puththiranaip Petraal.
58 karththar Avalidaththil Thammudaiya Irakkaththai Vilangappanninaarendru Avaludaiya Ayalagaththaarum Bandhujanangalum Kelvippattu, Avaludane Koodach Sandhoshappattaargal.
59 ettaam Naalile Pillaikku Viruththasedhanampannumpadikku Avargal Vandhu, Adhin Thagappanudaiya Naamaththinpadi Adharkuch Sagariyaa Endru Peridapponaargal.
60 appozhudhu Adhin Thaai: Appadiyalla, Adharku Yovaan Endru Peridavendum Endraal.
61 adharku Avargal: Un Uravin Muraiyaaril Indhap Perullavan Oruvanum Illaiye Endru Solli,
62 adhin Thagappanai Nokki: Idharku Enna Perida Manadhaayirukkireergal Endru Saikaiyinaal Kettaargal.
63 avan Ezhuththup Palagaiyaik Kettu Vaangi, Ivan Per Yovaan Endru Ezhudhinaan; Ellaarum Aachchariyappattaargal.
64 udane Avanudaiya Vaai Thirakkappattu, Avanudaiya Naavum Kattavizhkkappattu, Dhevanai Sthoththiriththup Pesinaan.
65 adhinaal Avargalaich Sutri Vaasamaayirundha Yaavarukkum Payamundaayitru. Melum Yoodheyaavin Malainaadengum Indha Varththamaanangalellaam Sollikkollappattadhu.
66 avaigalaik Kelvippattavargalellaarum Thangal Manadhile Avaigalai Vaiththukkondu, Indhappillai Eppadippattadhaayirukkumo Endraargal. Karththarudaiya Karam Andhap Pillaiyode Irundhadhu.
67 avanudaiya Thagappanaagiya Sagariyaa Parisuththa Aaviyinaale Nirappappattu, Theerkkadharisanamaaga:
68 isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Sthoththiram Undaavadhaaga.
69 avar Nammudaiya Pidhaakkalukku Vaakkuththaththam Pannina Irakkaththaich Seyvadharkum;
70 thammudaiya Parisuththa Udanpadikkaiyai Ninaiththaruli:

71 ungal Saththurukkalin Kaigalinindru Neengal Vidudhalaiyaakkappattu, Uyirodirukkum Naalellaam Bayamillaamal Enakku Munbaagap Parisuththaththodum Needhiyodum Enakku Oozhiyanjeyyak Kattalaiyiduven Endru,
72 avar Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Aabiragaamukku Itta Aanaiyai Niraivetruvadharkum;
73 aadhimudharkondirundha Thammudaiya Parisuththa Theerkkadharisigalin Vaakkinaal Thaam Sonnapadiye,
74 thamadhu Janaththaich Sandhiththu Meettukkondu, Nammudaiya Saththurukkalinindrum, Nammaippagaikkira Yaavarudaiya Kaigalinindrum, Nammai Iratchikkumpadikku,
75 thammudaiya Thaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Vamsaththile Namakku Ratchaniyakkombai Erpaduththinaar.
76 neeyo Paalagane, Unnadhamaanavarudaiya Theerkkadharisi Ennappaduvaai; Nee Karththarukku Vazhigalai Aayaththampannavum,
77 namadhu Dhevanudaiya Urukkamaana Irakkaththinaale Avarudaiya Janaththukkup Paavamannippaagiya Ratchippaith Theriyappaduththavum, Avarukku Munnaaga Nadandhupovaai.
78 andhagaaraththilum Marana Irulilum, Utkaarndhirukkiravargalukku Velichcham Tharavum,
79 nammudaiya Kaalgalaich Samaadhaanaththin Vazhiyile Nadaththavum, Avvirakkaththinaale Unnadhaththilirundhu Thondriya Arunodhayam Nammaich Sandhiththirukkiradhu Endraan.
80 andhap Pillai Valarndhu, Aaviyile Palangondu, Isravelukkuth Thannaik Kaanpikkum Naalvaraikkum Vanaandharangalile Irundhaan.
